location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf, at Camp Do Karack to Captain Charles Sealy, Commander of the HC Cruizer Ternateand Senior Marine Officer in the Persian Gulf

mods.abstract: The letter is overriding the Resident's previous instructions concerning the captured batilla (a small sea going vessel), conveyed in his letter to Captain Sealy dated 2 September 1824 (see f 27 1). It states that the batilla should not be broken up, but left in its present state pending the arrival of Sooltan bin Suggur's [Sulṭān bin Saqr] people.
